companies.name: LumeCube
companies.reason: A leader in portable lighting solutions that enhance photography, videography, and live streaming, gaining attention for their innovative products.

companies.name: Boom Supersonic
companies.reason: Pioneering sustainable supersonic flight with their Overture aircraft, which is designed to be environmentally friendly and efficient, garnering significant media attention recently.

companies.name: Synapse
companies.reason: Providing advanced AI solutions for business processes, focusing on automation and collaboration, positioning themselves as a notable player in the tech startup landscape.

companies.name: Figma
companies.reason: A cloud-based interface design tool that facilitates collaborative design work, experiencing a surge in popularity and usage as more companies embrace remote work and digital collaboration.

companies.name: Notion
companies.reason: A versatile workspace tool combining notes, tasks, and databases that has gained traction for its productivity-enhancing features, especially as organizations look for better remote working solutions.
